author: Vlad Shelest
description: Vlad’s inspiration: “Everything in our life revolves around rhythm; we all feel the impulses that float from us and come to us. From the music in our headphones, the city meeting the sunrise, the bar crowded like a beehive or the strikes of ice in a shaker, every one of us is searching for our own unique and exciting beat. The Bacardi family has always kept a finger on this pulse, catching the tempo of the generations, no matter how many times circumstances hit that groove. For more than 150 years they have proved that this rhythm, stemming from Cuba, cannot be oppressed.”
name: Groovy

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
Special ingredient #1: Kaffir lime syrup (Bring 250 ml water with 500g of sugar to the boil, pour into a blender with 30g of kaffir lime leaves
Beat well and strain through a coffee filter
